location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 19 of 1854 from Captain Arnold Burrowes Kemball, Resident in the Persian Gulf, at Bushire to Henry Lacon Anderson, Secretary to the Government, Secret Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: The letter is forwarding a transcribed extract from a communication sent by Colonel Rawlinson, the Political Agent in Turkish Arabia, to the Resident in the Persian Gulf. The extract concerns a protest Ahmed Effendi, the late Turkish Ambassador to the Court of Persia, is expected to promote against British interference in Kutiffe [Al-Qaṭīf] and Bahrein [Bahrain].
